admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific
trustfund:
TF053320-PHRD-LAO PDR: SECOND ROAD
            MAINTENANCE PROJECT (APL)

abstracts.cdata!:
This second phase of the Road
            Maintenance Program (RMP2) will expand the operation of
            financing, and management systems for the sustainable
            maintenance of the road networks countrywide, based on the
            successful experience of initiation, and piloting under the
            first phase. The project components are as follows. By
            adopting a programmatic approach, the preservation of the
            road network will support in part, Annual Work Programs, in
            periodic, and routine maintenance, including on selected
            local roads network, and, strengthen quality implementation.
            The capacity building component will support the
            strengthening of the transport sector capacity in two core
            business functions - management and financing of the road
            infrastructure, and, management of road transport and safety
            - as well as the general institutional capacity at both
            national and sub- national levels. Finally, Project
            administration, will support efficient administration of the
            Program, through project monitoring, i.e., strengthening
            project management, reporting, monitoring of project impacts
            and safeguards, and preparation of future sector programs.
            Furthermore, incremental operating costs, include modest
            budget support for project-related activities at central and
            provincial levels, while auditing includes financial and
            technical audits to ensure the quality of project implementation.
